price: (46) And one who invites to Allāh, by His permission, and an illuminating lamp.
arabic: وَدَاعِيًا إِلَى ٱللَّهِ بِإِذۡنِهِۦ وَسِرَاجٗا مُّنِيرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wadāʿiyan ilā al-lahi bi-idh'nihi wasirājan munīran
